name: Survive The Rain
description:
Survive The Rain is a bouncy bullet-hell game made for the ScoreSpace Jam 23 in just about 72 hours. We had a blast making the game and we are sure you are going to have one when you try it!

How To Play
  • Don't get hit by enemy projectiles.
  • The more projectiles you dodge, the more score and energy you get.
  • Decide to use your energy to either teleport or to shoot.
  • Utilise many ways of gathering energy and score, find strategies you like, survive as long as you can and get your name written onto the top of the leaderboard!
Controls
  • WASD / Arrow Keys >>  Move around
  • Space >>  Teleport to your cursor
  • Mouse Click >>  Fire on the cursors direction
